resources.string: This demo demonstrates the off-screen feature. Draw off-screen and see your drawing to the right.
On the buttom right corner of the virtual screen there is a button. Hover above it at different heights to change the opacity of the circle. Press it to change the color of the circle.

This demo shows how the background side channel can operate while screen is on or off. Draw off-screen and see your drawing to the right. Your drawing is recorded whether the screen is on or off, or if you switch to another app.

Use these buttons to control the hovering feature. Disabling it will not affect the touch events. Pressing the side-button will change the color of the hover circle. Use the slider to set the maximum distance for the hovering events.
Please configure the SDP button to be the eraser button in the global settings. You may use the eraser bypass switch to disable the eraser functionality.
